text:
Methods can be added to constructors without module qualification
```julia> using Base: Int, run

julia> run(x) = 1
ERROR: error in method definition: function Base.run must be explicitly imported to be extended
Stacktrace:
 [1] top-level scope at none:0
 [2] top-level scope at REPL[2]:1

julia> Int(::String) = 99
Int64

julia> Int(1)
1

julia> Int("1")
99```
